name: Matt Stone
text: I've eaten Pizza Hut for probably 35 years and this is the first time I've been disappointed. The outer 4 pieces really weren't worth eating since they were mostly crust. The breadsticks were a bit hard, and the cinnamon sticks stuck to the paper in the box. I've had this combo several times and never had these issues before.

name: George West
text: Impressive service by or waitress. She made sure all our needs were met without hovering over or party. We look forward to going back for more.

name: John Usher
text: Home location never fails with consistent delivery and take out.

name: Brent Tebbe
text: I've honestly had some tasty food here, but the bad experiences keep adding up. There are too many other pizza places in town to keep coming back.

name: Bernadette Kottkamp
text: I had ordered a pizza & wings online for delivery but somehow I ended up with 2 orders of wings. The delivery driver Christopher suggested I call and speak to the manager Zach so I called. He was so nice and offered to make our pizza and â€¦More

name: Curtis Taylor
text: Always messing up my orders

name: Jean Packman
text: Went with a friend and had salad bar, it was good

name: Mike Hasenstab
text: The lettuce was not good big hard pieces

name: Jeremy Herrin
text: I eat at Pizza Hut buffets all over the metropolitan area and I love this one the most.

name: Danielle Carver
text: Good place to eat and the food tastes great, would recommend to people who love pizza and aren't sensitive to MSGs

name: jld7777
text: Awesome staff, great food.

name: Robert Milton
text: "Just leave them on hold until they hang up" - employee of Highland Pizza Hut. Embarrassing service

name: Tammy Wheat
text: They didn't put bacon on the pizza we ordered. Everyone was very nice.

name: AJ Richter
text: Came here for lunch today and the place was absolutely disgusting. Only one person trying to clean the whole place. Maybe if your manager could've gotten off his phone long enough to help out this would be a different review. Nobody is above cleaning. Won't be eating here again!

name: Trey Busch
text: Best darn pizza and staff in Highland IL.

name: Pam Fenton
text: Best Pizza Hut pizza I've had in a long time.  Excellent service,  too!!

name: Leah Pisaneschi
text: They have wonderful staff

name: fishing is my drug
text: Wife called in a to go order. I went to get it. Got home, wrong order. Took it back. No offer for refund, discount. Nothing. Not even an I'm sorry. Oh, the pizza tasted like flavored paper.

name: Josiah Romoser
text: Great buffet deal!

name: Mark McGranahan
text: I'd say there is good as the other Pizza Hut locations we visited around the country.   Our family sure does love their deep dish pizza :)

name: ThePuppetkamon
text: Incorrect information online about what time their buffet ends and staff was incredibly rude when asked for clarification.

name: Jack Wyatt
text: It would be so much better if they had good crust and used real cheese - some frozen is better.

name: Rhonda Massey
text: Holiday so no buffet kind of disappointing, but the pizza was awesome!!

name: Keith Spealman
text: Good food, friendly staff

name: savvy Nickolle
text: My boyfriend was  just on the phone and the guy had no clue what he was talking about saying the dinner box didnâ€™t come with both breadsticks and cinnamon stick or cheese sticks for a exstra dollar he would put down the phone and ask â€¦More

text: A very good bang for the buck, good pizza and good  prices ðŸ˜€ðŸ˜€

name: Susan Smith-Harmon
text: Food is good. I mostly carry out, so can't speak about service in dining room.

name: STARLETT RENKEN
text: love the pizza and wings here. have used delivery many times, usually on time and very nice.

name: Douglas Missey
text: All the tables were dirty at lunch time. We had to get our own silverware and the buffet wasn't stocked very well at all.

name: Mary Rapien
text: Yummy love their lunch buffet

name: Charles Silvey
text: I hate this place.  They are awful. The food is horrid and the service is terrible.

name: Crystal Campbell
text: Only thing worthwhile is the breadsticks the pizzas way too greasy ask him to cook it a little longer they won't

name: Jill S
text: Hate is such a strong word, but I was very dissatisfied with my service/experience at the Highland, IL Pizza Hut today.  Normally, I don't like to negative review, but this is why it got 2 stars.  A few years ago, my family and I used to â€¦More

text: Quick reliably good lunch buffet

text: Great

name: Daniel Raja
text: The service was not the quickest! The drinks were not refilled fast enough. We had to wait for about 3 to 5 mins for out drinks to be refilled.

name: Josh King
text: Love Pizza hut. Usually never disapoints.

name: Ruth Mudd
text: Not a good variety on the food bar.

name: Dalton Schmidt

name: Michael Converse
text: Highland Pizza hut is hands down better than Troy.  We had buffet and both bars were full of food and pizza was hot.

name: Todd Angle
text: This place has a lunch buffet which is right up my alley. Monday thru Friday only though.

name: Doug Kruse
text: Only 2 workers present.   Cook was on a smoke break for 25 minutes.   Waiter worked his tail off to try and compensate.  Took much longer to get our food than expected.

name: Jen Chandler
text: Old food, buffet not attended to.

name: shane taylor
text: Owner went out of the way to remedy our problems when our order was messed up by corporate call center.
